text: @realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall Wouldn’t it make much more sense to invest that money back to taxpayers and utilize a “trickle up” economic theory. 5 Coronavirus bills have been passed with only 1 designed to help the people, barely. We need UBI and we NEED it now
